title: Champions that look like they don't have pupils but you're wrong they actually do!

replies.body:
{{champion:36}} {{champion:82}} 

?

Mundo lost his pupils from the years of child abuse.

Mordekaiser's eyes are fuelled by edgy goth teenagers who listen to heavy metal therefore unable to create pupils.
#**Triggered**

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=n91ktWjh,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2018-08-05T11:46:44.866+0000)
>
> #**Triggered**

ecks deee
Your answer saddens and disappoints  also seem completely off base
Didn’t you quit the game?

5.18 to 6.18  after a year of not playing it became hard to talk about the state of the game so I started playing again.
Would cycle through depression, frustration, helplessness & would take month long breaks before attempting to find Enjoyment again. 
Then the AP item changes hit and suddenly Morde had options where none existed before. 
Then they nerfed Marksmen and I can actually say I'm Enjoying playing the game.
Holy shit are you ok dude? Do you need to talk to someone?

Thank you for your concern. I am in a good place.  I enjoy playing again and find  that I can win with the proper mindset as I find the game right now is closer to balanced  in regards to melee vs ranged

https://imgur.com/FKCZVwD 

TFW enemy groups mid and your 2/13 Yasuo flashes his Mastery 7 as he barrells towards them saying "watch this lol" in chat
"watch this (overwatch play of the game music plays)"
{{champion:64}}

*When you take eye contact to the next level*

######But in all seriousness, interesting post. I certainly didn't expect some of these to have proper human like eyes.
Interesting post, really calls to attention, of allt he little details talented artists put into their pieces.

> Champions that look like they don't have pupils

To me there is no champion which looks like a teacher.
{{champion:11}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:13}}

> [{quoted}](name=Cetri,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=n91ktWjh,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2018-08-05T16:58:21.049+0000)
>
> {{champion:11}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:13}}

**looks** like a teacher


######well, maybe Ryze

Great job on the time and afford spend in this post and is something different !
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This shitpost took 10 minutes. But thank you

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=n91ktWjh,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2018-08-05T23:35:14.696+0000)
>
> This shitpost took 10 minutes. But thank you
> 
> {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

That vlad sticker is the cherry on the top
IS THAT A JOJO REFERENCE?!?
You say “pupil*s*”, but Rengar only has one.

Oh sorry Rengar isn't on the list.

FUN FACT: Rengar has no pupils.

https://imgur.com/wGN9IqR

But The thumbnail. ...

Cough. I meant none!
No
Actually Ryze is a blueish violet.

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeTheSmurfMage,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=n91ktWjh,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-08-05T05:59:39.247+0000)
>
> Actually Ryze is a blueish violet.



You said blueish therefore I don't have to change anything! 

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/ae/Joy_Pengu_Emote.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20180308201557
Wow
Most of these were obvious to me. Syndra's was only hard to spot due to her splashart being outdated af.
O aren't you a special snowflake.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=n91ktWjh,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-08-05T23:35:47.741+0000)
>
> O aren't you a special snowflake.

And?
Praise be to you

Vlad's pupils are barely noticable, but they're there. They're easier to see in his skins.
https://i.imgur.com/c9rmbgu.jpg

Edit: You had to get snarky, didn't you?
https://i.imgur.com/KJdqPEp.jpg https://i.imgur.com/pWB2kZf.jpg

Skins don't count sorry

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/99/Bee_Sad_Emote.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/90?cb=20180508204109
Cue silver scrapes. Dis guy got rekt.
That was EPIC! Can w̷̢̾͐̂̀e̴̓̓ͅ t̴a̸k̷e̶ ̶o̷u̸t̸ ̵m̷y̴ ̴e̷y̷e̵s̶ ̶a̵n̷d̸ ̷o̴f̷f̷e̷r̸ ̶t̵h̸e̶m̷ ̴t̸o̴ ̷o̷u̵r̶ ̵l̷l̷o̸r̶d̶ ̸B̸e̷l̴i̵a̷l̷ ̵t̶o̶ ̶m̷a̴k̶e̸ ̵m̷e̸ ̸h̷i̶s̵ ̷p̸r̷o̷p̶h̴e̵t̷ ?

{{champion:25}} looks like she has no pupils, but I have a poster from Riot's official merchandise store featuring Morgana fighting Ahri and you can very clearly see her pupils. Didn't realize how many other champions there were like that, though!
{{champion:421}}
I gotta give propes for Panth's eyes they look awesome.
